quote: First learn the meaning of what you say, and then speak. – Epictetus
fact: Count the number of cricket chirps in a 15-second period, add 37 to the total, and your result will be very close to the actual outdoor Fahrenheit temperature.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: Don’t interrupt someone working intently on a puzzle. Chances are, you’ll hear some crosswords.
